Why Choose Us

Great Benefits of Adult Coloring Books

ğŸ§  Your brain experiences relief by going into a meditative mood
ğŸ¨ Stress and tension levels have the potential to be dropped
â˜¯ Damaging thoughts are eliminated as you take in positivity
â­Concentrating on the present assists you achieve mindfulness
ğŸ’» Unplugging from modern technology promotes creation over consumption
ğŸ¨ Coloring books can be done by anybody, not just specialists or creative types
ğŸ‘© It's an activity that can be taken with you wherever you go

Tell the truth - How stressful your life right now? Do you know our anti-stress coloring book has help many of our subscribers reduce Stress Relief by 80%, Can You believe That? Give it a try and find out the great benefits of coloring therapy and slowly say good bye to your stress, with this anti-stress coloring book

In our fast-moving world where time is money and money is time, most of us forget to dedicate some time off for the important goal of relaxation. We are constantly irritated, 
frustrated and angry. Our body's focal consciousness point is placed far away into the distance and we forget that we have only one chance of living. Is this how we would like to spend our counted days? When was the last time you asked yourself - whatâ€™s right for me?

Many of us have already heard about the powerful effects that coloring books and other patterns have to influence our brains. It has been proven that drawing spirals can improve your memory, rainbow coloring has the ability to decrease cortisol levels in your body and mandala coloring can reduce anxiety and perform as a highly efficient stress therapy. 

ğŸ¦„ Coloris - Coloring Book for Adults Free offers a break from the stressful world in which we are living. Start thinking about what's really important. Download now and start thinking about your healthğŸ¦„

Coloris - Coloring Book for Adults Free is suitable for 1-123 year olds. It contains intricate patterns and coloring pages of animals, flowers, nature and more designs organized into categories. This coloring apps for adults magically transfers the pleasure of putting pencil, crayon or paintbrush to physical coloring pages and turns your Android device into a perfect tool to relax and sharpen your drawing skills. 

Coloring for adults offers a mind therapy journey. Feel your muscles soften and relax, experience your focus going back into your body and breath again. Let go of your anxiety and stress. Sink into this world of color, refill your energy, explore the secret garden created with beautifully detailed illustrations and bring them to life using your imagination. After downloading this app, we promise, you will say â€œThis is the best app for me !â€.

We will not take advantage of our apps therapeutic abilities. We offer dozens of beautiful free coloring pages that we will not charge a cent for. Forget about paying for the best content, with our color app youâ€™ll be able to choose from a wide variety of categories & designs. Select incredible color palettes, color zen tools, and much more features to create fantastic & unique pieces of art. Share your creations with your friends and family your creations with our Facebook and other social media networks sharing options. Save to your gallery your finished pieces of art, to use them as wallpaper or any way you like!
